Depends on how badly it broke. Rinse it thrououghly to make sure there are no shards that'll fly off when you rip. If you absolutely can't get a new bowlpiece and need to smoke, be careful and don't pull too hard (keep any glass shards from flying up outta the water). But you really should just get a new bowlpiece.
